tasks.run: deno task build-nxg && deno task run-build
tasks.build-nxg: "c:/Program Files/National Instruments/G Web Development Software/gwebcli.exe" build-application -p ./WebVIDeno.gwebproject -t "Default Web Server" -n WebApp.gcomp
tasks.run-build: cd "Builds/WebApp_Default Web Server" && deno task start
